title: The new coaching team | VfL Wolfsburg
snippet: First Team 05/07/2025 Â· Daniel Bauer, Julian Klamt and Tobias Holm in profile. There will be three new faces in the VfL Wolfsburg dugout when the Wolves take on TSG 1899 Hoffenheim under the Volkswagen Arena lights on Friday evening.

title: Wolfsburg name Daniel Bauer permanent head coach | Bundesliga
snippet: Daniel Bauer has been name full-time head coach of Wolfsburg.

title: Paul Simonis: Who is the new Wolfsburg head coach? | Bundesliga
snippet: With Paul Simonis landed at Wolfsburg as the team's new head coach, bundesliga.com takes a closer look at the Dutchman who made waves in his homeland...

title: Wolfsburg appoint Paul Simonis as new head coach | Bundesliga
snippet: Wolfsburg have named Paul Simonis as their new head coach for the 2025/26 season on a two-year contract.

title: Players and Staff | VfL Wolfsburg
snippet: Ein dunkler Monitor verbraucht im Gegensatz zu einem hellen bis zu 20% weniger Energie
